title: CLI for GitHub user contrib graph and statistics
author: chr15m
content: readme.md cli github user contrib graph & statistics tool is intended facilitate archiving your public data hosted github.currently supported user stats:contributions graph.language statistics.total repos, stars, followers, following.pinned repositories.yearly contributions count.installpip install thxgh(hint: --user install ~/.local/bin/)run usage help:$ ./bin/thxgh usage: ./bin/thxgh [--contributions|--stats] github-username--contributions print svg contributions graph stdout.--stats print json formatted statistics the user stdout.--repos print json formatted list repositories.download contributions graph svg a user:$ ./bin/thxgh --contributions chr15m > chr15m-contributions.svg language statistics pinned repositories a user:$ ./bin/thxgh --stats chr15m{ "languages": [ { "count": 29, "percent": 23, "language": "javascript" }, ... ], "timestamp": "2017-05-18t09:52:18.093690", "stats": [ [ "repositories", "135" ], [ "stars", "481" ], [ "followers", "109" ], [ "following", "294" ] ], "contributions-": 2254, "pinned-repos": [ { "name": "thxgh", "language": "hy", "url": "https://github.com/chr15m/thxgh", "stars": 2, "forks": 1, "description": "cli github user contrib graph & stats" }, ... ]} list repositories a user:$ ./bin/thxgh --repos[ { "fork": false, "open_issues_count": 0, "watchers": 0, "description": "cli github user contrib graph & language stats", "name": "thxgh", "forks": 0, "created_at": "2017-05-18t02:02:21z", "forks_count": 0, "updated_at": "2017-05-18t11:44:09z", "html_url": "https://github.com/chr15m/thxgh", "language": "hy", "clone_url": "https://github.com/chr15m/thxgh.git", "watchers_count": 0, "full_name": "chr15m/thxgh", "ssh_url": "git@github.com:chr15m/thxgh.git", "open_issues": 0, "stargazers_count": 0, "id": 91637951, "size": 13 }, ...]
